DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this retrospective chart review is to evaluate if the implementation of lumbar plexus block placement for postoperative pain have improved conditions in the postoperative period for patients undergoing total hip arthroplasty when compared to the placement of epidurals for postoperative pain management.
DOC.brief_title: Compare Epidural vs. Lumbar Plexus Analgesia After Hip Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Primary outcome: 48 hour opiate consumption in patients following THA. ' Secondary outcome: Time to first ambulation, assistance needed with ambulation, opiate and regional related side effects, time to discharge orders.
DOC.criteria: 18 years and older Diagnosis of: 1. Primary THA, (identified by CPT code 27130) 2. Either a) Epidural (CPT code 62319) or b) Lumbar plexus peripheral nerve block (CPT 62311 or 64449) Perioperative multimodal medication Hospitalized from July 1, 2012 to December 17, 2014. THA Revision ICU admission postoperatively History of dementia
